description: Number of primitive (period n) bracelets using exactly two different colored beads.
comments: Turning over will not create a new bracelet. Identical to A001371 for n>1.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
formula: Sum mu(d)*A056342(n/d) where d divides n.
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
